Method Detail

browseChildren

public void browseChildren(java.lang.String objectId,
                           int startIndex,
                           int fetchCount,
                           java.lang.Object userData,
                           Types.IBrowseChildrenCallback callback)
                    throws Types.InvalidDeviceException,
                           Types.DeviceOfflineException,
                           Types.InvalidCommandException,
                           Types.ServiceDisconnectedException,
                           Types.UnknownErrorException
Browses the media server for all child entries under the specified container object

Parameters:
objectId - Id of the container object to browse. Use ROOT_DIRECTORY to browse the server root directory
startIndex - 0 based index of the first entry under the container to browse
fetchCount - The max number of entries to fetch. Use FETCH_ALL to fetch all entries under the container
userData - Optional - userData that will be passed to callback
callback - A callback function to be invoked with the browse result. See OnReceivedInfo result param for possible result codes.
Throws:
Types.InvalidDeviceException
Types.DeviceOfflineException
Types.InvalidCommandException
Types.ServiceDisconnectedException
Types.UnknownErrorException
